title: RODEO® KING™
subtitle: Flame grilled Chicken
text: The RODEO® KING™ Sandwich features two savory flame-grilled beef patties totaling more than ½ lb.* of beef, topped with 3 half-strips of thick-cut smoked bacon, our signature crispy onion rings, tangy BBQ sauce, American cheese and creamy mayonnaise all on our sesame seed bun.

title: BBQ Bacon WHOPPER® Sandwich
subtitle: Enjoy the BBQ Flavor
text: Our BBQ Bacon WHOPPER® Sandwich features a ¼ lb* of savory fire-grilled beef, topped with thick-cut smoked bacon, melted American cheese, freshly cut iceberg lettuce, creamy mayo, ripe tomatoes, ketchup, onions, crunchy pickles, and layers of a sweet and smoky bbq sauce, all on a warm, toasted, sesame seed bun.

title: Bacon & Cheese WHOPPER® Sandwich
subtitle: Juicy & superbly tasty
text: Our Bacon and Cheese WHOPPER® Sandwich is a ¼ lb.* of savory flame-grilled beef topped with thick-cut smoked bacon, melted American cheese, ripe tomatoes, fresh lettuce, creamy mayonnaise, ketchup, crunchy pickles, and sliced white onions on a soft sesame seed bun.
